description:
Natsuo’s perception of Hina changes when she reveals how she first met Shuu. Later, Rui comes to Natsuo with a surprising request — one he isn’t sure he should fulfill.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Avoir une relation, ça reviendrait à faire ça, non ?
This Is What It Means to Go Out Together, You Know?
Tsukiautte, Kou Iu Koto Da yo?
付き合うって, こういうことだよ?
